products.title: Riftbound: Origins Booster Box
products.description: Complete booster box containing 36 packs of Riftbound: Origins. Each pack contains 10 cards including at least 1 rare or better.

products.title: Custom Resin Deck Box (Dragon)
products.description: Custom 3D printed resin deck box with dragon design. Holds 100+ sleeved cards. Made to order - 5-7 day turnaround.

products.title: Riftbound Official Playmat
products.description: Official Riftbound playmat featuring stunning artwork from the Origins set. Rubber backing, cloth top.

products.description: Custom 3D printed and hand-painted Jinx miniature. High-detail resin print. Made to order - 7-10 day turnaround.

products.description: Adorable chibi-style Poro plush toy. Officially licensed Riftbound merchandise. Approximately 6 inches tall.

products.title: 3D Printed Dice Tower (Noxus Theme)
products.description: Custom 3D printed dice tower with Noxus faction theming. PLA filament. Made to order - 3-5 day turnaround.
